definitions.definition: A nightjar , especially Caprimulgus europaeus ( Eurasian nightjar ).
A New World nightjar of the genus Chordeiles , especially Chordeiles minor .
A person whose preference or custom is to remain awake and active during the night and the early morning hours.
A nighthawker ( metal detectorist who works illegally at night ) .
An unlicensed prostitute who worked the roadsides at night.

main_definition: ( UK , regional ) A nightjar , especially Caprimulgus europaeus ( Eurasian nightjar ). [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( US ) A New World nightjar of the genus Chordeiles , especially Chordeiles minor . [from 18th c.]
A person whose preference or custom is to remain awake and active during the night and the early morning hours. [from 19th c.]
A nighthawker ( metal detectorist who works illegally at night ) .
( Japan , historical ) An unlicensed prostitute who worked the roadsides at night.
